A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie felt like a waste of time. The majority of the plot focused on the purple haired girl as the antagonist\, only to later reveal that she just didn't feel like telling anyone her plan. Rey (who apparently has no parents) hardly trained on the island since Luke was too old and whiny to do anything. Not to mention Snoke was killed off without having any backstory. This movie was horrendous\, but gets 2 stars because the Yoda scene was pretty koo.
